attributes.action: Provide state money and backing in order to fund the creation of a Cornish Language Television Station within Cornwall to champion the language in the same way as BBC Alba and S4C
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Cornish language revival seen in recent years is doomed to failure if it fails to embrace the modern world. Wales and Scotland are both lightyears ahead with their own publically owned national language TV stations. The British government should help the people of Cornwall in expounding their national language.
